quote: Sex is the expression of intimacy, touching and personalized care that takes friendship another step further. There is a trinity of sex, spirituality and friendship which all need to be present.
quote_letters: SEX IS THE EXPRESSION OF INTIMACY TOUCHING AND PERSONALIZED CARE THAT TAKES FRIENDSHIP ANOTHER STEP FURTHER THERE IS A TRINITY OF SEX SPIRITUALITY AND FRIENDSHIP WHICH ALL NEED TO BE PRESENT
